extension.name: Cacheable Datasource
extension.description: Improve page performance by caching data source output XML.

releases.release: - Code fix: Use CACHE for consistentcy (#28)
- Bug fix: Make sure the cache file gets created (#26)
- Add cache-expiration attribute in Data Source (#24)
- Fix regression with ignored data sources (#22)
- Fix wrong label which is in seconds, not minutes (#22) - Fix potential remote code execution vector
- Fix issue with associated sections (#12) - Prevent double caching when the data source is a remote or dynamic data source - Add support for frontend_localisation and multilingual fields
- Fix parameter pool handling (#14) - Fix datasource filter storage (#17) - Clean-up
- Improved and updated documentation in readme file
- Added cache folder creation, if missing

- major milestone release - removed unnecessary bloat of the Cache Viewer page - cache files are now stored in a folder within the cache directory for easier bulk purging - no more editing of data sources! Caching is applied unobtrusively with delegates and JavaScript (Symphony 2.3+) meaning you don't need to touch PHP and customise your data source files
- fixed a major bug whereby the extension would not escape invalid XML properly
